Title: Extends the timeframe during which a proceeding with respect to a primary, convention, meeting of a party committee or caucus shall be instituted
Summary: Extends the timeframe during which a proceeding with respect to a primary, convention, meeting of a party committee or caucus shall be instituted to twenty-five days after the holding of such primary or convention or the filing of the certificate of nominations made at such caucus or meeting of a party committee.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to extending the timeframe during which a proceeding with respect to a primary, convention, meeting of a party committee or caucus shall be instituted
